description: Designed for all-day performance and protection, this ski bib is built to take on epic snow days. A waterproof-breathable shell keeps moisture out while an advanced thermal-reflective lining keeps heat in. Ski-friendly features include multi-functional pockets, articulated knees, and internal leg gaiters.
name: Columbia Sportswear Highland Summit Bibs, Reg - Big - Mens

specs.value: 100% Polyester 60g Microtemp XF II 85% Recycled Polyester
